1 name: Check formatting and run tests
 2 
 3 on: [push, pull_request]
 4

 6   linux:
 7     runs-on: 'ubuntu-latest'
 8     steps:
 9     - uses: actions/checkout@v1
10     - name: Check formatting
11       run: ./scripts/checkformatting.sh
12     - name: Run core tests
13       run: ./scripts/runcoretests.sh
14     - name: Run application tests
15       run: ./scripts/runapptests.sh
16 
17   mac:
